ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2017-01-25
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2017-01-31
      3. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2017-01-31
          -A technical working group was created to study the bill, together with other bills of same import.
      4. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-01-31
          -To be consolidated with other bills of similar subject matter.
      5. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-03-14
      6. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-05-22
      7. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-05-22
          -Substitute bill was approved, in consolidation with other bills amending RA 7277 . Report to be submitted to the mother committee.
      8. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2017-12-05
      9. Approved by the Committee on 2017-12-05
      10. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-12-11
      11. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-03-14
      12. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2018-03-14
          -Substitute Bill to House Bills Numbered 656, 1584, 1586, 1916, 2396, 4865, 5058 and 6284 was approved with amendment.
